directions: Put onion, garlic, rosemary, mint, lemon zest, apple cider vinegar, and olive oil into a food processor and pulse to combine.

Sprinkle a generous amount of salt and pepper over the lamb. Place marinade and lamb into a 1-gallon freezer bag. Spread marinade over all sides of the meat. Seal the bag and refrigerate for 1 to 2 hours, best if you can do it over night
Remove lamb from refrigerator and let come to room temperature
Grill on the grill over indirect heat for 35 minutes or till it reaches an internal temperature of 135 degrees for rare.
ingredients:
1 tablespoon
                            - apple cider vinegar 
 4 cloves
                            - garlic 
 2 tablespoons
                            - kosher salt 
 4 pounds
                            - leg of lamb 
 1 whole
                            - lemon peel zested
 2 tablespoons
                            - mint leaves 
 3 tablespoons
                            - olive oil 
 3 tablespoons
                            - rosemary 
 1/2 whole
                            - yellow onion
title: Grilled Leg Of Lamb

directions: Combine all the ingredients into a blender and blend till smooth
ingredients:
1 whole 
                            - banana 
 2 cups
                            - frozen berries 
 1 teaspoon
                            - honey 
 2 cups
                            - skim milk 
 2 scoops
                            - whey protein powder 
 2 tablespoons
                            - yogurt plain
title: Protein Fruit Shake

directions: Slice the peppers and onions into thin strips
Grill the brats on the grill or a grill pan
While the brats are grilling, in a sauce pan add the onions, peppers olive oil, butter and garlic cook over medium low heat.
In about 3 minutes pour in the beer and season with the red chili flakes, kosher salt, and pepper.
Let the pepper mixture simmer and reduce.
Set the brats aside when they are finished cooking
Split and Toast the hoagie buns
Assemble the sandwich by putting the mustard on the bun, with the brat, and then add some of the peppers.
ingredients:
1/2 cup
                            - beer flavorful
 1 teaspoon
                            - black pepper 
 1 package
                            - bratwurst 
 1 teaspoon
                            - butter 
 4 cloves
                            - garlic minced in jar
 1 package
                            - hoagie buns 
 1 teaspoon
                            - kosher salt 
 1 tablespoon
                            - olive oil 
 1 whole
                            - red bell pepper 
 1 whole
                            - red onion 
 1 tablespoon
                            - red pepper flakes 
 4 tablespoon
                            - spicy brown mustard 
 1 whole
                            - yellow bell pepper
title: Brats And Drunken Pepper Sandwich
